name: Telekinetic
description: You come to your senses in a strange place, around the damaged bodies of people and a lot of blood, you have a head pierced and, instead of the left hand, its mechanical likeness, which is endowed with an interesting feature - telekinesis.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7 Processor: Core i3-530 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 260 Storage: 9 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7 Processor: Core i5-560m Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 660 Storage: 9 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
